Financial: Military retirement pay exclusion from state income tax
Veterans preference in state employment (5-10 additional points)
Utah Department of Veterans and Military Affairs emergency assistance
Small business development programs for veterans
Education: Purple Heart Recipient Free Tuition - full waiver at state institutions
Utah National Guard State Tuition Assistance Program
In-state tuition for veterans using GI Bill
Scholarships for children of disabled veterans
Recreation: Free hunting and fishing licenses for 100% disabled veterans
State park annual passes for disabled veterans
Housing: Disabled Veterans Property Tax Abatement - up to ,400 for 100% disabled
Property tax exemption for surviving spouses
Other: Utah Veterans Cemetery and Memorial Park
Stand Down events for homeless veterans
